name: SimpleBench
description: A multiple-choice text benchmark where individuals with unspecialized (high school) knowledge outperform SOTA models
methodology: Multiple-choice questions across spatio-temporal reasoning, social intelligence, and linguistic adversarial robustness

dimensions.name: Spatio-Temporal Reasoning
dimensions.description: Questions testing spatial and temporal reasoning abilities

dimensions.name: Social Intelligence
dimensions.description: Questions testing understanding of social dynamics and human behavior

dimensions.name: Linguistic Adversarial Robustness
dimensions.description: Trick questions testing linguistic understanding and robustness
